DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics MEDI-546 Japanese SLE patient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Intravenous Dose MEDI-546 Japanese Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.detailed_description: A phase 2 , multicenter , open-label , dose-escalation study evaluate safety tolerability intravenous dose MEDI-546 , human monoclonal antibody direct type I interferon receptor ( IFNAR ) , Japanese subject active systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE )
DOC.criteria: Fulfils least 4 11 American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) classification criterion SLE . Weight great equal 40.0 kg .
